front.title: Requirements for IP Multicast Session Announcement

abstract.t: The Session Announcement Protocol (SAP) [2] was used to announceinformation for all available IP multicast sessions to theprospective receiver in an experimental network. It is easy to use,but not scalable and difficult to control the SAP messagetransmission in a wide area network. This document describes theissues and the requirements for multicast session announcement in theglobal Internet.
